name: Galactic Attack (uwut09)
description:
You are an agent of the UGA (United Galactic Alliance). You have been sent to eliminate the 'aggressor' Chitouin enemy ships that have invaded the planet. Your task is to destroy all the Chitouin enemy ships that can phase through the environment and destroy you. You will possess only 3 lives for each game so make sure to play wise and tactfully.

This is my 2D Shooter Project; below are some of the modifications that have been made:

1) Changed the SFX in many areas

2) Changed elements of the UI 

3) Created a new enemy type

4) Re skinned the player sprite

5) Created a new level

Credits: Created by Muhammad Hamza
